description: Another Lucas Entertainment exclusive model is having his debut scene in what will be collected into the future film “Raw Threeway” -- Ashton Summers. Ashton is a professionally trained ballet dancer, which comes in handy for handling his body during sex. Letterio Amadeo makes a return to give Ashton a test drive alongside James Castle (who I’ve taken note of having a very handsome face). Everyone gets a turn bottoming, but Ashton is first up as Letterio and James pass him around. But even though he has a deliciously tempting ass, Ashton is more than capable of pounding his tops too!
title: Letterio Amadeo And James Castle Double-Team Ashton Summers
